entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 20 except minus 11 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20 except minus 11 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 March 2023
